EmailTemplate.description: Reminder email for Debbie's Lunch & Learn Wall Builder event in HOuston
EmailTemplate.name: Invite Email - WB Lunch & learn - Houston
EmailTemplate.subject: Wall Builder Lunch & Learn Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.FirstName}, I just wanted to remind you that there is an upcoming Lunch & Learn event at Vinson & Elkins on Wednesday, June 11. Only registered participants will be allowed to attend, so please register by visiting: http://www.intapp.com/reg/lunchregister_tx.html
I hope you can make it.
Regards,
-Debbie Hineman
IntApp Lunch-and-Learn – Wall Builder
Come join us for an informal lunch and discussion about IntApp Wall Builder and how it helps firms manage risk and confidentiality enforcement.
IntApp Wall Builder enables firms to closely manage access to internal information. Scenarios driving the need for confidentiality include waiver-driven ethical walls, client requirements, management concerns about the scope of access available to contract attorneys and compliance with regulations such as SEC, SOX, HIPAA, ITAR and European Union directives.
Wall Builder provides law firms with centralized control, enforcement and visibility of confidentiality policies. With over 100 customers, including 35% of the AmLaw 200, and a vibrant partner community, IntApp has been embraced and endorsed as an industry standard.
Attend this session to learn more.
Date: Wednesday, June 11 Time: 11:30am – 1:00pm with lunch included
Location: Vinson & Elkins, L.L.P. Conference room 25D 1001 Fannin St. Suite 2500 Houston, TX 77002
Registration: http://www.intapp.com/reg/lunchregister_tx.html
